website_summaries.verdict: Merrick’s grain-free kibble will grab your cat’s attention because of its 3 tasty high-quality protein sources, but you’ll appreciate its balance of carbs, vitamins, minerals, and fiber.
pros: Salmon, turkey, and chicken are the first 3 ingredients
70% of the formula is animal protein
Made for indoor and outdoor cats
cons: Bottom of bag collects food dust from kibbles that break down

customer_reviews.title: My baby's favorite
customer_reviews.text: This was my Barkley's favorite until he developed kidney failure and had to be put on a special diet. Barkley always had a sensitive stomach and the brand was the best one for him. He seemed pretty excited every time I filled his bowl. I feel odd leaving a five-star review of the flavor, but I think that's what B would say. The scent was not overpowering or offensive at all. Value for money? Yes, it costs more, but for a happy tummy and less vomit to clean up, I'll gladly pay. Finally, please enjoy this picture of Mr. Barkley. I know your day is better for having seen his cute face.
customer_reviews.author: Melody AF

customer_reviews.title: Smelly Cats No More
customer_reviews.text: I first fed my kittens "Purina ONE Healthy Kitten Formula" (in addition to canned food) because that was what they were eating before I adopted them. Though my kittens were playful and affectionate, they were also very stinky due to excessive flatulence. I suspect the soy and grain products in the Purina kibble were contributing to this problem. After upgrading to Merrick's soy and grain-free "Purrfect Bistro" kibble, their flatulence subsided and I'm enjoying their cuddles much more! They're playful growing boys with no digestive problems since I made the switch. I think this product is worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Sykes

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, healthy kibble for kitties
customer_reviews.text: Our kittens love this food. They're healthy and playful. Made in USA! Added a photo for the person who wanted to know the size of the kibble.
customer_reviews.author: S'Kay

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed in Amazon's handling of the product, it arrived with a lot of kibble turned into ground up dust.
customer_reviews.text: Great healthy product for adult cats. I mix together the Salmon & Chicken dry kibble and all seven fur-babies love it. Amazon's storage and/or packing-shipping leaves A LOT to be desired. I have now ordered this twice from Amazon; thinking the smooshed kibble the first order (both bags) was just a fluke - nope! This second order was even more smooshed than the first bags. I would guesstimate that at least 2-3 inches of the kibble arrived as ground up dust. So I will go back to ordering this and all other dry food from Chewy. This food is too expensive to throw away due to poor quality control on Amazon's part.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Food looks like sawdust
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in poor condition. The package was fine but when I opened the package and poured it into our food storage container, it was mostly dryfood dust with solid pieces mixed I had to throw the entire package out.
customer_reviews.author: Dara F. Ottley-Brown

customer_reviews.title: Product is fine. I buy it because I have a cat ...
customer_reviews.text: This review is more about the seller than the product. Product is fine. I buy it because I have a cat with digestive issues, and this source of protein causes less irritation for him without a bunch of meat by products. I've ordered this before with no problems, but this time the bag had gotten a big rip in it, and they just taped it up and sent it. See Photos. I feel if they are going to send it to me with damaged packaging I should at least get a discount.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great cat food! Crap packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Product pros: Everything, pretty much. Well, except maybe the price, but you get what you paid for. This it's the only kitten food I've found in the last three months that doesn't give my cat gas and induce the runs. So yay, A+! Product cons: Nothing. The cat loves it, the hedgehogs love it, and my household is poor but happy. Amazon cons: whoever packaged my box was an idiot. They put a hard cover book with no protection into a large box with this bag of cat food, so it tore the bag open, making cat food spill out and get oils all over the box and my book. Thanks, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be just like Merrick's before grain seemly discontinued brand but
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be just like Merrick's before grain seemly discontinued brand but, higher in meat by 12% i believe. mainly wanted to let others know that the kibble size is exactly the same tiny size that before grain had since info. was hard to find. have not fed this to cats yet, i assume they will like it just as much as the merrick before grain #1 chicken that all 10 loved right away (they pretty much starved themselves with the #2 salmon flavored one though). this bag is alot easier to reseal compared to the before grain resealable bags as well.
customer_reviews.author: Casper & BooTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Kitten loves it!
customer_reviews.text: grain free kitten kibble is surprisingly hard to find. Luckily I found the purrfect bistro by Merrick. I have purchased Merrick products in the past, and I have always been impressed with the quality. This product didn't disappoint. The pieces are tiny. Perfect for tiny mouths like my six week old kitten's. The price is also fantastic. I have seen this same product sold at some stores for three or four dollars higher than what Amazon sells it for. The only thing I wish is that this food wasn't an add on item only, as I don't really need to buy three bags at a time. My kitten seems to like this food, so I'll keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea H.

customer_reviews.title: Too much powdered food in the bottom of the bag.
customer_reviews.text: Food is okay, but there is a lot of powdered food in the bottom of the bag. My cats won't eat the food when too much is powder. Separating the whole pieces of food from the powder is problematic. Otherwise, this is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: The Skeptic

customer_reviews.title: The only dry food we'll buy!
customer_reviews.text: Been giving this food to our cat since we was a kitten. He loves it, once he even tore open the bag before we had a chance to put it away. Our vet told us that he was the healthiest cat she's seen in awhile and told us to keep doing what we were doing. We mix a small handful of this with some Tikicat wet food. Our cat loves it and have maintained his energy, his poop is also very managable and does not stink.
customer_reviews.author: Bippy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because of the ingredients and the company reputation. I like that it is made completely in the US and the ingredients are from the US also. Our cats love the flavor and between the Merrick canned food (my cat family's primary meal source) and this dry food as a supplemental meal my cats are happy, active, healthy and their coats are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon O. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my cats problems!
customer_reviews.text: Only cat food that keeps my cat happy with a healthy appetite and beautiful coat. Everyone talks about how soft her fur is and so healthy and bright she looks. You are what you eat and this is quality! You get what you pay for! More info: My cat was allergic to other brands and suffered from feline acne and had a low immune system. Ever since we started her on this purrfect bistro she hasn’t has any problems and is a great weight! I’m a happy owner
customer_reviews.author: esperstar

customer_reviews.title: Quality nutrients
customer_reviews.text: My senior cat was losing weight so I wanted to get a food with better nutrients. Something higher quality. I bought this and was a little concerned on if my cats would eat the new food but they both loved it immediately. Its brown small circles. They dont smell overwhelmingly like anything to me but ththe cats coming running when I open the bag. So I'll be buying again
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Nolan

customer_reviews.title: HEADSUP cat lovers; Merricks was 74% MEAT
customer_reviews.text: Just a HEADSUP cat lovers: My cat loves Merrick's PURRFECT BISTRO dry foods, the first THREE ingredients being MEAT. Disappointed to see now that Purina has purchased Merrick's foods, that only the first TWO ingredients are meat and customers now get only 11 lbs instead of the generous 12 lbs when owned by Merrick's. I mix equal parts of the Purrfect Bistro Salmon, Duck/Turkey, and Chicken in a large bowl and my 19 lb lynx point wilderness cat totally loves it and I feel secure knowing he is getting the best. I have stocked a large supply and will have to go to another brand of grain free cat food when he finishes off my stored supply.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: My cats don't like this at all...Wasted food...
customer_reviews.text: My cats do not like this dry food at all...They have been eating Fancy Feast dry cat food (as well as wet food) for a long time. I thought that I would try this, that it might be healthier...It is all now going to be wasted, b/c they won't eat it... Only thing good is the way the package closes up at the top, to keep it fresh. But like I said, both (2) cats will not eat it. So I am stuck with a full large bag of this stuff...
customer_reviews.author: deborah t.

customer_reviews.title: Helps my cat
customer_reviews.text: As one of my cats got older he developed a constipation problem. I got this food for him as part of a total change over in his diet. This food, along with canned food and medication, has solved his problem
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but maybe not for sensitive kitties
customer_reviews.text: Nice ingredient list and all 3 of my cats like it. However, my 9yo female can't eat it without regurgitating (not vomiting) it almost immediately, indicating a food intolerance. I switched her to a limited ingredient formula that I found locally, and she's been fine with that, so if you have a sensitive kitty this might not be the food for your pet. UPDATE - I tried the "Limited Ingredient" version of this food and my sensitive girl tolerates it well, and the other 2 cats love it. If you have a sensitive kitty, try the limited ingredient version!
customer_reviews.author: E.M.B.

customer_reviews.title: unsure about quality
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Merrick products for my dogs before and this was the first time I bought it for my new kitty. The food arrived promptly and my kitty is eating it without hesitation. However, when I transferred the package contents to a container, I noticed how pulverized the food was. I would say a good percentage of the kibbles are dust. Because I have never bought this type, I am not sure the food is supposed to be like that. But my best guess is that it should not. :(
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Bag was NOT sealed upon receipt, just like in video above.  Be sure to check yours.
customer_reviews.text: See the video above, showing how the package was received without being properly sealed? I received my first bag in the exact same manner. I suspect that many people are receiving similar bags, but because it isn't anything obvious, then never know. Not unless you actually press against it, to hear the air escaping, where you can smell the food inside of it. Or do as the man did in the video and use soapy water. Dry food starts to go rancid within TWO weeks. That's why if you purchase large amounts that won't be eaten before that time, you need to put out only what will last just over a week, and freeze the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Night Owl

customer_reviews.title: I love this food for my cats
customer_reviews.text: I love this food. The 12 lb bag lasts my three cats right around a month, depending on how full I'm keeping their bowl (I free feed/refill the shared bowl about daily, and they are all a healthy weight). It's got great ingredients with a superior amount of protein compared to a lot of other popular brands, and helps keep all of my cats healthy. The seafood helps keep their coats silky soft, and they all seem to enjoy eating it! I'd recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Remy Z.

customer_reviews.title: Kitten Likes It
customer_reviews.text: I have had my 8 month old kitten on this dry food combined with the wet food they offer. She has been gaining weight and has been healthy at vet checkups. Her coat is extremely shiny and she is always interested in her food. The smell of it isn’t the best, but I think that’s the norm for cat food. Wish it was a bit less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Ekim666

customer_reviews.title: It's a winner in our house!
customer_reviews.text: We've slowly been switching our kitty over to this from the kitten formula, and he's loving it! I accidentally left the bag out on the floor the first day I bought it, and he ripped into it, ha! So, a clear indication that he likes it :) Update: Our baby kitty LOVES this food! He gets so excited when we pour some into his bowl (even if there's already some in there, which is usually the case). My husband has to battle him to get the food into the bowl before our kitty starts eating it, ha! Definitely a great natural choice and great upgrade/transition from the kitten formula.
customer_reviews.author: Stasia SaysTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: It must taste delicious - because my adorable kitten, Apollo Moon absolutely loves it! He price is right - it was delivered quickly- very satisfied! Will order again and again!
customer_reviews.author: DAPHNE

customer_reviews.title: Great healthy food
customer_reviews.text: My cats like this food enough to eat it, but don't love it enough that I have to control how much they eat. That great so I can keep their food tower out and fill it up weekly. It's healthy for them and not nearly as expensive as other similar products.
customer_reviews.author: B.C.C.

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it and are fit and frisky
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 year old cats who are always playful, and have no dandruff, are not overweight, and very healthy. I tried to switch for another similar type of food at the grocery store, and they flat out rejected that until I brought back this one. So, if anything, the only downside is that your cats won't want any other food.
customer_reviews.author: Ice cream samarai salami

customer_reviews.title: My Cats won't eat it
customer_reviews.text: My cats won't eat it al all. I thought eventually they'd have to give in out of hunger. but nope, they're losing weight and still refuse. Waste of money unfortunately. I bought mixers and treats to add in, hopefully that helps.
customer_reviews.author: cash

customer_reviews.title: Kittens' favorite and it's the same price as going to the store
customer_reviews.text: This is my kittens' favorite dry food. It costs the same to get it from Amazon as in the physical store, but everyone else online sells it for the same or more. So I buy it from Amazon, it's delivered for free and I get reward points on my credit card. Anyway. It is what it is. It's supposed to be good for them, they like it, and at 8 months the vet says they're fine and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Al S

customer_reviews.title: Merrick Perfect Bistro Grain Free
customer_reviews.text: We have a cat that throws up with most food. Up until recently we were feeding her Evo cat food, but it has been discontinued by the manufacturer. We tried this, having good luck in the past with their wet food. Merrick has again come through for us and our cat can eat it and keep it down. They do not seem to eat it as quick as the Evo, but it is also a brand new food.
customer_reviews.author: Groovy 1

customer_reviews.title: Full of Crushed Bits
customer_reviews.text: There is so much crushed material in the food that I have tried to sift it out but it continues to make its' way to the surface. My cats really like this food but I hate that I always see the crushed bits on the surface of the food. I have another unopened package but if this problem continues but I be changing food soon.
customer_reviews.author: bigdmah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent food for your cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat has been eating this food for years and has had no issues. She gobbles it up too quickly though, but I suspect that is because I have a "scarf and barf" kitty. She previously ate the old formula version, Before Grain, and had no trouble transitioning to the new stuff either. She is a beautiful long haired 6.5 yr old kitty, with no skin issues, no dandruff, and no other major health issues. She does have stinky poops (maybe because she is grain free?) but at least they are regular, firm/never watery, and she rarely gets constipated. This food (and all of Merrick's cat products) is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Massive bloating and constipation
customer_reviews.text: After several months of feeding this brand dry food to my large mainecoon, he’s developed serious constipation, bloating and scooting. I have had to bring him to the vet to make sure he wasn’t having major health issues. I’m immediately taking him off this brand and not feeding it to him again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My guys both like it- supplement canned
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been feeding this since they were a year old (they are now almost 2.5yrs old). I supplement with 3oz of canned mixed with hot water as it is critical to keep fluid intake up. We also have a fountain for water. My guys are not fond of seafood/fish flavors so this bring poultry based works best.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Our cat is happy!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t comment on the flavor, but our cat seems to really enjoy it! I prefer to feed him food that doesn’t just consist of a bunch of fillers. He doesn’t have tummy issues, like he has had with other brands. This is our second time purchasing it. Has a great resealable bag too!!
customer_reviews.author: RLo

customer_reviews.title: Two paws up!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only dry cat food I buy, because it's great quality and my cats actually like it It's also made in America (or was, the last time I checked). I did try Blue and a few other grain free varieties, but they would barely sniff them. They also get wet food twice a day. The dry is mainly because one of my cats prefers dry. It's also what they get when I need to leave for work for a couple of days (only a couple times a year).
customer_reviews.author: Renee Faraday

customer_reviews.title: My cat refused to eat
customer_reviews.text: My cat refuse this! This food came in totally crushed no chunks my cats refused to eat it it was disgusting and it up throwing it away it was a total waste do not buy do not
customer_reviews.author: coolerhelper

customer_reviews.title: Grain free - cured cat gas
customer_reviews.text: Although this food is more expensive than others, I feel good giving it to my kitty. She likes it and it keeps her from getting digestive problems (such as a noisy stomach and foul smelling gas) as other foods made with junk ingredients. I think it’s worth the expense for a healthy & happy cat.
customer_reviews.author: Review Girl

customer_reviews.title: Quality food for half the cost!
customer_reviews.text: I Just have to say, if you are looking for quality cat food at a reasonable price this is the cat food for you!, I used to put my kitten on Wellness or Blue Buffalo which put a bit of a dent on my pocket, so I had to look for a brand exactly like them but for half the price! and Merrick definetly takes a run for there money. My kittens are healthy and grain free, I will stick with this catfood! so if youre looking for quality try a bag of Merrick, I have nothing but praises for this company
customer_reviews.author: Kylee Brown

customer_reviews.title: Food, not food dust!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this item from the local pet store many times. This last bag ordered was 2-3 inches of food dust in the bottom, I feel like I got the bottom of the barrel, mostly dust, little food. An expensive bag of dust. Very disappointed in Merrick this time.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Adams

customer_reviews.title: Our cats have learned the word crunchies!
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love it. We mostly feed them high quality wet food (grain-free, etc.) which they don't love but it's better for them than all dry food. However, when they hear the bag of Merrick's rustling (or a bag of rice or whatever, that sounds the same, LOL) they all come running. They've even learned what the word "crunchies" means... :)
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: My kitten loves it so much he gorged on it
customer_reviews.text: My black kitty, rescued from the streets of Antioch, loves this food. He ran out a few weeks ago, so I substituted another brand I had on hand, which he reluctantly ate (he also eats canned food). Today he got this kibble back, and he asked for so many helpings that he gorged for the first time in his life, which fascinated him. Moderation, little guy.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Quality ingredients
customer_reviews.text: My cat has decided to be picky about his food. Tried five other brands and gave them away. He loves this one. His weight is just right. Cant tell about energy cause mittens is a very lazy boy.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Too many crumbs
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if was old or damaged during shipment, but a quarter of the bag was dust that my kittens refused to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine DeMille

customer_reviews.title: Kitten turns into a vacuum when this is given to him, small size is good for eating. May be a bit hard for younger kittens.
customer_reviews.text: GREAT cat food, kitten gobbles it up. He's been eating it since he was very young and loves it still. We were worried since his teeth were so little and even though the food is tiny kibbles, they are hard as hell. He didn't really seem to have any issues. The vet said he had compacted teeth though.. not sure if this is from the hard food, which would be a real bummer... I'll have to ask the vet the next time I see them. Maybe not so great for real young kits, better for the adolescents just in case.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Smelly poop :(
customer_reviews.text: My kitty seemed to really enjoy eating the food the first few days, but I noticed he started having gas issues. The litter smelled horrible, it filled my entire apartment. The poop changed consistency, it was terrible and smelly. I went back to his original food and it’s finally getting better.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kibble
customer_reviews.text: Cat loves it but I have heard that Merrick has just been bought by a larger corporation. I expect the quality will change, or the food sources will change; so we are planning to switch foods. However the cat is a bit picky and has consistently loved this kibble, in either chicken or salmon flavors. The kibble is small, as cats prefer. It does not have an off smell as many types of cat food seem to have. No smell at all, really. Not much else to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Currer Bell

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in great condition. Important to feed cats good quality grain-free ...
customer_reviews.text: Convenient way to get Merrick! Arrived in great condition. Important to feed cats good quality grain-free food and Merrick fits the bill in terms of quality and price. ---- Update (5 stars to 4 stars): Still pretty good, but the kibbles are smaller and not all the same size or shape. There is more kibble dust. Please monitor quality control. Will see if my next order is better.
customer_reviews.author: L510

customer_reviews.title: Wrong flavor delivered
customer_reviews.text: My cats like the chicken flavor which is what the picture displayed when I ordered it. The chicken & sweet potato flavor is what was delivered & I didn't notice until the bag was opened. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Got wrong food.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love merrick so it's not a total waste, but I ordered this because my cat has hairball problems and this is the one I buy at petco normally. I recieved my food today and got a completely different bag that is not at all for hairball control and is chicken + sweet potato. Pretty annoying not to get the right product and will not order from you again.
customer_reviews.author: Hayli Haze

customer_reviews.title: Merricks is the best car food I've fed my cat(s)
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old cat has had digesftive issues on and off for years. Someone recommended Merrick's cat food and I switched from Blue Buffalo. She is doing very well with Merricks and has fewer spit ups and other issues. I think feeding them a grain-free food made with real meats makes sense. I've had 6 cats over 35+ years and this food seems the best so far.
customer_reviews.author: DustyMom

customer_reviews.title: Fussy Siberian Kitty Approved
customer_reviews.text: While I am weaning my Siberian off of dry kibble -- this is a great choice as a side addition. She loves it and she does not gain extra kitty fat eating it - but keep in mind I feed her Merrick canned food too. I have a happy healthy girl.
customer_reviews.author: CrossCountry

customer_reviews.title: Works great for skin issues and my cats love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know about scent and taste but my cats love it and it cured their skin issues they were having with food containing grain.
customer_reviews.author: Becky West

customer_reviews.title: My kittens just love this
customer_reviews.text: They hear the bag and come running. Purrfect grazing food for all day snacking. Does not get soggy with high humidity of summer.
customer_reviews.author: Still River Editions

customer_reviews.title: Tiny pieces
customer_reviews.text: My cats seem to really like it. Can't find their favorite any more but this seems like a good replacement for it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Gilliland

customer_reviews.title: Grain free high protein cat food
customer_reviews.text: This is the highest protein, grain free kibble that is tolerated and LIKED by my kitty with IBD and liked by all 10 other cats at a price I can afford. His diet is primarily wet food, as I know it is much better for him, but he is 16 years old and grew up on dry kibble - I can't take it away from him completely, plus I am not always able to be home when he wants to eat so leave the Merrick kitten kibble available for him.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Malone

customer_reviews.title: Bugs in my Cat food
customer_reviews.text: I just received a bag of this cat food. when my Husband dumped in the container we keep it in it had bugs running through the food. I really can't send it back. I am rather upset! Never had this happen before.
customer_reviews.author: carol j senderak

customer_reviews.title: Grain Free Kitten Food
customer_reviews.text: One week in and Athena loves it. She used to try and sneak pieces of my dogs food but now she purrs and eats well. It was a toss up between a few grain free brands on here and I went with this based on overall reviews. Glad I went with my gut.
customer_reviews.author: D.W.

customer_reviews.title: Cats Love It! 😻
customer_reviews.text: My cats love the salmon recipe & it's nice to be able to have this bag delivered vs lugging it from the store. I have it in my Subscribe & Save for the extra value.
customer_reviews.author: LilyPut

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this food.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something more healthy for my cats as they are getting older and Merrick Purrfect Bistro is perfect for them. They love it! The kibbles are nice and small and break up easily when they chew. I have this food out all day and they eat canned cat food in the morning only. My cats are usually fairly picky eaters but they love this food. Me and my cats couldn't be happier with this food.
customer_reviews.author: J. StrohTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Merrick is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo happy to find this on Amazon. I don't mind going to Petco to get it but sometimes I just don't want to drive down there. This saves me some time and a tiny bit of money. This food is made in the USA with all holistic ingredients. Check out their website for more info. Both my dog and my cat won't eat anything but the Merrick and that's coming off of Blue Buffalo which after doing more research I became less and less happy with overall in the quality of their food.
customer_reviews.author: M. Keifer

customer_reviews.title: Velcro closure! Healthy and satisfying food!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is very fussy and she devoured this food! She instantly loved it! There is an ingenious velcro closure on the bag!!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael's Opinions

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and value
customer_reviews.text: Both of my pets really like Merrick’s food. My cat stopped throwing up on a weekly basis and my dog will wait until I fill her bowl and then she chows.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Constant throwing up
customer_reviews.text: My cats liked the taste of this product, but are constantly throwing up after eating it. Note that one of the ingredients is powdered cellulose which is another way of saying wood is an ingredient. Be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzie

customer_reviews.title: my cat doesnt barf anymore.
customer_reviews.text: my cat used to barf daily multiple times a day. so i decided to try grain free. they seem to love this food. i love that i can get it shipped in 2 days free on prime. price isn't too bad for what you get. only complaint is that one bag was odd color compared to others and cats didnt like it as much. i think it was just a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Brown

customer_reviews.title: Catface LOVES this
customer_reviews.text: My Calico Cat loves this food. She had been a bit of a picky eater and then a friend gave me some of the Merrick Purrfect Bistro. Now she is a great eater. I know the quality is great on this product and feel safe feeding it to my cat. Plus it was cheaper here than I could get it locally and no lugging the bag home!
customer_reviews.author: Sayyadena

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cat food
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cat food. We use all 3 of Merrick Grain Free flavors. I use the chicken for their treats, and other 2 for their main food. They do not know they are also just eating good quality cat food for their treats! Hee-hee! Was buying the Temptations Treats, but quit buying those also! At first they wouldn't eat Merrick, so mixed it with their grain cat food. Didn't take long and they were 100% Merrick. (I took out grain food, so they were forced to eat the Merrick). They are so much healthier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best dry kitten food
customer_reviews.text: We recently rescued four kittens. The rescuer had them on this food so I continued it. In the beginning it was difficult to find locally but now Petco stocks more of it so they're not always out. The kittens seem to like it, but I wouldn't say they love it. Of course, dry food is no comparison to wet food, but since I cannot feed them several times a day, I leave the dry food out. When they become adults, I plan on switching them to a completely wet diet.
customer_reviews.author: twihardcatmom

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to review kitty food since I'm not a cat! My kitten liked it at first but later wouldn't eat it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: roseanne

customer_reviews.title: Cat won’t eat this shipment of food.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been on auto delivery for this product for a while. My cat will not eat the last shipment that was sent. She started to rip into our food, jump on counters ... looking for Food. I figured out she was not eating her own food. I just bought a new bag of same food from petsmart and she ate it instantly. Something is wrong with this bag of food.
customer_reviews.author: DJ M

customer_reviews.title: Good quality kitten and cat food brand
customer_reviews.text: Good quality cat food. Kitty is thriving. It's worth buying them healthy stuff because of the long term health affect when not eating right. Thanks merricks and thanks Amazon! Petsmart doesnt sell this and I cant always go to prtco..plus its q little cheap on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Good food for my kitty
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this. She has apparently developed a food allergy/intolerance to poultry and after going on this food for two weeks I can see that she is looking less puffy and her feline acne is clearing up.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Good Cat Food for Cats with Allergies
customer_reviews.text: My cat has bad food allergies and every food I'd give her made her scratch. I was worried because she had scabs all over her face and neck, and then I found this food. Within a week she stopped scratching and her neck and face healed up completely. She's also very tiny and has a hard time eating larger kibble cat foods, Marrick Purrfect Bistro are these little itty bitty kibbles are are easy for her to munch on. I'm happy with this food and so is my cat. She won't stop eating it!!
customer_reviews.author: McCoy Family

customer_reviews.title: A lot of the kibble turned to powder
customer_reviews.text: When I first used this bag of food for my cats I thought maybe the bag was upside down and I got a lot of the powdered pieces from the bottom but the powdered food is throughout the bag. Not what I expected it ever experienced before. The cats don't seem to like this bag of food like the previous one
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: My cats like this food BUT!!!!!Today's
customer_reviews.text: My cats like this food. But today's new pack of it was cut (see at photo). So i don't know how much cat was lost because of it . I'm upset But anyway will buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina

customer_reviews.title: Cat wouldn't touch it
customer_reviews.text: We got this for Passover because it doesn't have any wheat, which was very convenient. I myself have no complaints about how it looked and smelled, but the bottom line is that the cat wouldn't eat it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schechter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but my cat hated it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ingredients, but my cat wouldn't eat it. I mixed it into her old food very slowly, but she very slowly picked out each piece and dropped it outiside her bowl. This went on for a couple weeks. I ended up mixing it with the dog food. My dogs were very happy about that!
customer_reviews.author: OKshopper

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try something new for my kitten. I was just feeding him Blue Buffalo Kitten food and wanted to switch it up. I bought this because it was on a list of the top kitten foods and the reviews were good. My kitten loves this food. Not only could I tell he really loved it, he would be bouncing off the walls after he ate. It gave him a ton of energy and spunk. Love it, will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: PurrrrrFect Food
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a finicky eater and she took too eating it so she likes it
customer_reviews.author: Stixxx99

customer_reviews.title: My cat eats it
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing she eats. Won't even consider something else.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Higley

customer_reviews.title: Love that's it's on prime for cheaper cost
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by our cat rescue organization who is picky about which food we give our cat. This one reads healthy, is not too expensive and is on PRIME. Saves me a side trip to pet store. I consistently buy this from Amazon. Our car seems to like it and is a healthy eater and decent weight but he's an active indoor/outdoor cat.
customer_reviews.author: Angeline Rose

customer_reviews.title: My cats like it
customer_reviews.text: It keeps my whiner blessedly silent (she cries if she is hungry, even if it is 3am, or 4am, ignoring her for hours does nothing, and she rattles the blinds to wake me...). I had high hopes this would be a dry food I could feed my diabetic cat (based off another review), but it still has too many carbs and after a week or so she started drinking a lot more, I had to change the litter twice as often, and so for her I had to go back to wet food, which is unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Has the formula changed? I have purchased this cat ...
customer_reviews.text: Has the formula changed? I have purchased this cat food for several times and it have been okay...no problems. In my last purchase ( a couple days ago) this cereal looks different. The cereal looks flat and darker, and my cat doesn't eat it. Can anyone help me? Did the recipe change?
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great food!!!
customer_reviews.text: My cats really like this food! I notice a real change in their energy levels and appearance of their coats, since changing from a cheaper grocery store food. I am happy with the ingredients and my baby with a sensitive stomach has not had any issues while on it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: our kitten loved it ! quality pet food makes a difference in a shiny soft coat
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: They all love it. My flagship American Bobtail named Taco had ...
customer_reviews.text: Have a lot of cats as strays stop by too. They all love it. My flagship American Bobtail named Taco had so hair issues but that has cleared up since she started eating these foods. There are 4 kittens out here that showed up and my God they are growing like crazy. Love this almost as much as the cats.
customer_reviews.author: jace sebastian espy

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: My cat has just transitioned from the kitten version of this brand to the adult. I have had one or two bags arrive with a rio in it, and toward the bottom of the bag there is sometimes a lot of crumbs but all in all a good product. My cat loves eating it and I’ve never had any health issues. First five ingredients do not have by-product so im happy.
customer_reviews.author: Klyn

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Different than before so not sure if anything difference but my cat still loves it compares to other dry food. Great value for the price and ingredients that are not as obnoxious as other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Thanh Le

customer_reviews.title: Just not for us
customer_reviews.text: Tried to switch from Crave but her highness didn’t care for it. I found the size and aroma pleasant but just couldn’t sell it.
customer_reviews.author: JustKag

customer_reviews.title: Good food - rips in bag?
customer_reviews.text: This food is great, but the shipping is not. I have ordered this twice now, and each time there is a rip in the bag where some of the food spilled out into the box. Other than that...this food has seriously improved my cats' diet. They used to shove down their food and then puke it up constantly. But with this food, they eat gradual amounts and haven't puked at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kitten loves it
customer_reviews.text: Have been feeding my kitten this food ever since I adopted her. Vet recommended it and the cat loves it too. She honestly seems to enjoy this more than her wet canned food. Love that this food is healthy for kittens and will give her all the nutrition she needs. She was very small when I adopted her (could see her ribs), and this food has helped her gain more body weight and get back on track in terms of health.
customer_reviews.author: Char K

customer_reviews.title: Eh. Not so great but healthy.
customer_reviews.text: My cats don’t really like it but eat it because it’s all they have. In my most recent order, the bag came with a hole in the side and food was coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if the cats like this flavor
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked the Merrick brand. I've bought this food twice - the first time my 2 adult cats seemed to like it, but the second time one cat is straying back to the dog food. Not sure if it's the flavor or what. Highly recommend Merrick, but will most likely try a different flavor next time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Proffitt

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: My Siamese cat, Allie, just loves this stuff. She has hyperthyroidism but is a picky eater. She is finally gaining weight and cleans her bowl on this. I love this stuff because it's made in the USA. Will continue to buy Merrick. Plus, the only pet store in my area, Pet Smart, does not carry Merrick. In fact, they'd never heard of it when I went in looking for it. They thought it was a new product!
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Good product. It has helped me raise a healthy ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. It has helped me raise a healthy kitty into a cat. My cat has a nice shiny coat, and well formed poops. He doesn't seem to tire of this food either. Other than initial parasites when I got him as a stray my cat has not had any health problems while eating this exclusively.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Cats Protested
customer_reviews.text: I liked the ingredients list. Thought it would be a real healthy treat for my cats... who only eat dry food. They don't like it and won't eat it. Perhaps their eating habits have been corrupted by what they've gotten used to. I'd ask them if I thought they would give me an answer. I'll just have to settle for their silent, but persistent protest.
customer_reviews.author: RJST12

customer_reviews.title: it's cat food
customer_reviews.text: cat likes it.cheaper in store but who wants to go there now.
customer_reviews.author: DA HERBSTER

customer_reviews.title: Cats are not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Only giving this 3 stars because my cats only ate this food if they were super hungry, in other words they both hated it. I wanted to support Merrick because their dog food is great, but my cats have to say the cat food isn't up to par.
customer_reviews.author: Alohr

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this food
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food. I had to switch to this food after my cats were eating Merrick backcountry. One of my cats needed to change due to hairball issues but this food works great for that. Plus I can read the ingredients on the package too.
customer_reviews.author: mojo

customer_reviews.title: repeat buyer
customer_reviews.text: 3rd time purchasing it, my cats really seem to like it. I found that their coats seem to be softer and shinier as well (we have 1 long hair and 2 short hair).
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Amos

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive kitties
customer_reviews.text: My sweet boy has allergies from poultry and this is the only crunchy food I could find that had simple ingredients and is affordable and he loves it! No more irritated skin!
customer_reviews.author: AnnaLuvsToShop

product_meta.title: Merrick Purrfect Bistro Grain Free Dry Dry Cat Food
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Salmon| Size:4 LBCats thrive on a grain free diet high in quality protein with moderate fat levels and low levels of carbohydrates. That's why Purrfect Bistro Grain Free Dry Cat Food provides balanced nutrition using real whole foods. This natural, 100% grain free formula cat food is ideal for adult cats with a focus on nutrient-rich ingredients to support overall health.
feature_bullets: Rich In Omega Fatty Acids For Healthy Skin And Fur
Grain-Free Recipe With No Gluten Ingredients, Artificial Colors, Flavors, Or Preservatives
Added Fiber For Hairball Control And Fortified With Vitamins, Minerals, Probiotics, And Antioxidants

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
